vendor_name: Sofitel Kia Ora Moorea Beach Resort
title: French Polynesian Paradise in Mo'orea with Fine-Dining & Spa
description:
This French Polynesian Sofitel paradise is surrounded by mesmerising waters and views of the island of Tahiti. A blissful escape on glistening white sands,  embrace relaxation amid lagoon waters and tropical gardens. Explore the vibrant underwater world of the Moorea Lagoon, teeming with colourful marine life, or venture to the island's verdant mountains and cascading waterfalls. 

Your overwater bungalow awaits as French luxury meets Polynesian hospitality. The resort offers a range of dining options, including K Restaurant, known for it's fusion of French and Polynesian cuisine. Unwind at Le Jardin Spa in a range of treatments inspired by local ingredients and traditions.
location_description: Sofitel Kia Ora Moorea Beach Resort
